name: Critical minerals
definition: Value chain adjacency; common-user processing. Upstream exploration/extraction adjacency and longer-term downstream processing/manufacturing.
economicFunction: Diversification from METS base; regional processing.
typicalCapitalStack: Government and industry co-investment in pilot facilities; offtake agreements.
typicalRisks: Feedstock certainty; technology scale-up; common-user facility governance.

name: Renewable energy
definition: Renewable transition requiring significant investment; Queensland pipeline; major projects including pumped hydro and energy hub concepts.
economicFunction: Construction-phase and O&M participation; local capture of pipeline.
typicalRisks: Awareness of construction-phase opportunities; specialised electrical capabilities; procurement structure.

name: Bioenergy
definition: Established locally with biocommodities pilot plant and sugar-to-ethanol precinct; newer biofuels demand drivers including sustainable aviation fuels.
typicalCapitalStack: Pilot and demonstration; offtake; feedstock agreements.
typicalRisks: Stakeholder perceptions on feedstock competition; market understanding; value chain targeting.

name: Biomanufacturing
definition: Future foods biohub business case; pilot plant upgrades enabling synthetic biology demonstration.
economicFunction: Fabrication and maintenance adjacency; bankability via certification.
typicalCapitalStack: Pilot facilities; certification pathways; process capability.
typicalRisks: Food-grade certification; limited technical understanding of biomanufacturing processes.

name: Circular economy
definition: Queensland-scale benefits; regional relevance via mining value chains and programs associated with the Resources Centre of Excellence.
economicFunction: Circular systems in mining value chain; lifecycle and regulation.
typicalRisks: Limited circular systems thinking; mine site control practices; waste regulation.

name: Space
definition: Investment attraction; Bowen Orbital Spaceport; one of only three dedicated orbital launch sites globally; licensing noted.
typicalRisks: Accreditation and procurement pathways; ISO standards; near-term demand uncertainty.

name: Post-mining land use
definition: Significant opportunity with expected mine closure periods and expenditure; proactive planning and progressive rehabilitation.
economicFunction: Scalable project class; rehabilitation and repurposing.
typicalRisks: Clarity on who carries ongoing risk; regional strategic planning frameworks.
